member.name: M:BuildUp.API.Controllers.AuthenticationController.Login(BuildUp.API.Models.Users.LoginModel)
member.remarks: The username can be both the email or the actual username
member.param: Represent the username and the password
member.returns: The user with all informations (especially the authentication token)
member.response: The user doesn't exist or the password doesn't match the username

member.summary: (*) Register a user as a coach or builder

members.member:
(Builder,Coach,Admin) Get a builder from his user's ID
The builder with all informations You are not allowed to refuse the requestss
The builder doesn't exist Return builder infos

(Builder,Coach,Admin) Return the user corresponding to the builder
There was an error in the request You don't have enough permissionss You are not allowed to view this user info Return user infos

(Admin) Get candidating builders
A list of candidating builders You don't have enough permissionss return a list of candidating builders

(Admin) Get active builders
A list of active builders You don't have enough permissionss return a list of active builders

The builder's coach There was an error in the request You don't have enough permissionss You are not allowed to view this builder's coach The builder's coach doesn't exist Return builder's coach

The builder's form answer There was an error in the request You don't have enough permissionss You are not allowed to view this builder's form The builder's form doesn't exist Return builder's form

The builder's project There was an error in the request You don't have enough permissionss You are not allowed to view this builder's project The builder's project doesn't exist Return builder's project

(Builder,Coach,Admin) Get the builder's card
You don't have enough permissionss The builder's card was not found Return builder's card

The builder's meeting reports There was an error in the request You don't have enough permissionss You are not allowed to view this builder's meeting reports Return meeting reports's project

(Builder) Get notification for a builder
The notifications You don't have enough permissionss Return the notifications
